name: Candy Shape Fill
description:
The game’s rule is very simple: drag these shiny jewels to the space in order to destroy the existed lines in both horizontally or vertically, but be careful because of letting no space available meaning the game will come to and end!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the block to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Don't worry! No time limits!
